quote.common_butterfly: I caught a common butterfly! They often flutter by!
quote.yellow_butterfly: I caught a yellow butterfly! Shouldn't all BUTTERflies be yellow?
quote.tiger_butterfly: I caught a tiger butterfly! I've earnt my stripes!
quote.peacock_butterfly: I caught a peacock butterfly! Now it's my turn to strut my stuff!
quote.common_bluebottle: I caught a common bluebottle! I'll put it in a rare green jar!
quote.paper_kite_butterfly: I caught a paper kite butterfly! Do I read it, fly it, or spread it on toast?
quote.great_purple_emperor: I caught a great purple emperor! Its purple reign is over now!
quote.monarch_butterfly: I caught a monarch butterfly! Guess the butterflies are a democracy now!
quote.emperor_butterfly: I caught an emperor butterfly! It's not your average monarch!
quote.agrias_butterfly: I caught an agrias butterfly! I wonder if it finds me disagrias-able?
quote.rajah_brookes_birdwing: I caught a Rajah Brooke's birdwing! Nothing else I'd rajah be doing!
quote.queen_alexandras_birdwing: I caught a Queen Alexandra's birdwing! That's a feather in my cap!
quote.moth: I caught a moth! And I had a ball doing it!
quote.atlas_moth: I caught an Atlas moth! I bet it never gets lost!
quote.madagascan_sunset_moth: I caught a Madagascan sunset moth! Wow, you're not from around here!
quote.long_locust: I caught a long locust! Or, as I call it, a looooocust.
quote.migratory_locust: I caught a migratory locust! Things just went south for this guy!
quote.rice_grasshopper: I caught a rice grasshopper! I've been looking for a gluten-free alternative...
quote.grasshopper: I caught a grasshopper! They're a grass act!
quote.cricket: I caught a cricket! What a chirp thrill!
quote.bell_cricket: I caught a bell cricket! It would make a great bellhop!
quote.mantis: I caught a mantis! Man, 'tis so cool!
quote.orchid_mantis: I caught an orchid mantis! Our friendship is blooming!
quote.honeybee: I caught a honeybee! Ah, sweet success!
quote.wasp: I caught a wasp! That's gotta sting...
quote.brown_cicada: I caught a brown cicada! Now it probably feels blue, cicada.
quote.robust_cicada:
I caught a robust cicada! It DOES seem pretty lively! (Normal)
I caught a robust cicada! Not so energetic in the rain, huh? (During rain)
quote.giant_cicada:
I caught a giant cicada! I guess it's PRETTY big... (Normal)
I caught a giant cicada! Guess it doesn't feel like singing in the rain! (During rain)
quote.walker_cicada:
I caught a walker cicada! Pffft. I walk all the time and no one calls me Walker {{playername}}. (Normal)
I caught a walker cicada! It must hate getting its feet wet! (During rain)
quote.evening_cicada:
I caught an evening cicada! Better than an odding cicada... (Normal)
I caught an evening cicada! This time it's WETTER than an odding cicada. (During rain)
quote.cicada_shell: I found a cicada shell! I'm glad the little guy came out of it!
quote.red_dragonfly: I caught a red dragonfly! Didn't even have to roll for initiative!
quote.darner_dragonfly: I caught a darner dragonfly! It better watch its mouth!
quote.banded_dragonfly: I did it! Did you see that? I caught a banded dragonfly!
quote.damselfly: I caught a damselfly! Now it's a damselfly in distress!
quote.firefly: I caught a firefly! I'm on fire now!
quote.mole_cricket: I caught a mole cricket! I really dig it!
quote.pondskater: I caught a pondskater! Wonder if it can do a pond ollie...
quote.diving_beetle: I caught a diving beetle! Now I'm making a splash!
quote.giant_water_bug: I caught a giant water bug! It should've stayed in the water!
quote.stinkbug: I caught a stinkbug! It lives up to its name!
quote.man_faced_stink_bug: I caught a man-faced stink bug! Reminds me of my uncle!
quote.ladybird: I caught a ladybird! Sorry to disturb you, ma'am.
quote.tiger_beetle: I caught a tiger beetle! I pounced first!
quote.jewel_beetle: I caught a jewel beetle! It's a real gem!
quote.violin_beetle: I caught a violin beetle! Apparently I'm as fit as a fiddle!
quote.citrus_long_horned_beetle: I caught a citrus long-horned beetle! Orange you happy for me?
quote.rosalia_batesi_beetle: I caught a rosalia batesi beetle! That's easier to do than say!
quote.blue_weevil_beetle: I caught a blue weevil beetle! It's the lesser of blue weevils!
quote.dung_beetle: I caught a dung beetle! This species likes faeces!
quote.earth_boring_dung_beetle: I caught an earth-boring dung beetle! It's not boring at all!
quote.scarab_beetle: I caught a scarab beetle! <small><small>It's just a dung beetle with better hobbies.</small></small>
quote.drone_beetle: I caught a drone beetle! Shouldn't you have more propellers?
quote.goliath_beetle: I caught a goliath beetle! Am I a legend or what?
quote.saw_stag: I caught a saw stag! Now I can't unsee it!
quote.miyama_stag: I caught a miyama stag! Its mandibles are jaw-dropping!
quote.giant_stag: <big><big>Whoaaa!</big></big> I caught a giant stag! I'm gonna need way bigger pockets...
quote.rainbow_stag: I caught a rainbow stag! Its rainbow armour is so shiny!
quote.cyclommatus_stag: I caught a cyclommatus stag! Those mandibles are a mouthful!
quote.golden_stag: Wooooow! I caught a golden stag! Does this mean I can retire?
quote.giraffe_stag: I caught a giraffe stag! Does that make it a longhorn?
quote.horned_dynastid: I caught a horned dynastid! I'd hate to hear it honk that schnoz!
quote.horned_atlas: I caught a horned atlas! I didn't even need a map!
quote.horned_elephant: I caught a horned elephant! I think it's too small to ride...
quote.horned_hercules: I caught a horned hercules! Guess I was stronger!
quote.walking_stick: I caught a walking stick! Check out its walking schtick! Look, these are the jokes, OK?
quote.walking_leaf: I caught a walking leaf! It seems to be taking it in stride!
quote.bagworm: I caught a bagworm! Guess I'm a bragworm!
quote.ant: I caught an ant! TELL ME WHERE THE QUEEN IS!
quote.hermit_crab: I caught a hermit crab! I think it wanted to be left alone!
quote.wharf_roach: I caught a wharf roach! This water-loving roach has no pier!
quote.fly: I caught a fly! I was just wingin' it...
quote.mosquito: I caught a mosquito! It's itching for a fight!
quote.flea: I caught a flea! <small><small>The curse is lifted</small></small>
quote.snail: I caught a snail! It's...not much to brag about.
quote.pill_bug: I caught a pill bug! That's a tough act to swallow!
quote.centipede: I caught a centipede! 99 more and I'll have a dollarpede!
quote.spider: I caught a spider! I spied 'er first!
quote.tarantula: I caught a tarantula! This situation just got hairy!
quote.scorpion: I caught a scorpion! It was a sting operation!

location.ground_leaf: On the ground under trees, disguised as fallen furniture leaves
location.ground_beach: On the beach, disguised as shells
location.ground_wharf: On the rocks found on the beach
location.underground: Underground (can be heard chirping, revealed when unearthed)
location.junk: On spoilt turnips and fishing junk
location.under_rocks: Under rocks (revealed when the rock is hit)

quote.bitterling: I caught a bitterling! It's mad at me, but only a little.
quote.pale_chub: I caught a pale chub! That name seems a bit judgy...
quote.crucian_carp: I caught a crucian carp! My skills are sharp!
quote.dace:
I caught a dace! Hope I have some space!

<small><small>...But I can't carry anything else! Should I swap it with something?</small></small>
quote.carp: I caught a carp! If I catch another they can carpool!
quote.koi: I caught a koi! I don't know why it's so shy... or such a bad speller...
quote.goldfish: I caught a goldfish! It's worth its weight in fish!
quote.pop_eyed_goldfish: I caught a pop-eyed goldfish! It looks so...surprised!
quote.ranchu_goldfish: I caught a Ranchu Goldfish! But I prefer balsamicu goldfish!
quote.killifish: I caught a killifish! The streams are safe again!
quote.crawfish: I caught a crawfish! Or else it's a lobster and I'm a giant!
quote.soft_shelled_turtle:
I caught a soft-shelled turtle! It's more sensitive than other turtles.
I caught a soft-shelled turtle! I should take a shellfie!
quote.snapping_turtle: I caught a snapping turtle! How can it snap without fingers?
quote.tadpole: I caught a tadpole... It's just a tad small.
quote.frog: I caught a frog! Or it's a new neighbour...and I have some apologising to do.
quote.freshwater_goby: I caught a freshwater goby! Time to go bye-bye!
quote.loach: I caught a loach! It's...looking at me with reproach.
quote.catfish: I caught a catfish! I'm more of a dogfish person...
quote.giant_snakehead: I caught a giant snakehead! Um...but I asked for a medium?
quote.bluegill: I caught a bluegill! Do you think it calls me pinklung?
quote.yellow_perch: I caught a yellow perch! Those yellow birds have to sit somewhere!
quote.black_bass: I caught a black bass! The most metal of all fish!
quote.tilapia: I caught a tilapia! It makes me happy-a!
quote.pike: I caught a pike! Think a swordfish would be up for a duel?
quote.pond_smelt: I caught a pond smelt! Whoever smelt it dealt it!
quote.sweetfish: I caught a sweetfish! Hope it's not artificially sweet!
quote.cherry_salmon: I caught a cherry salmon! It's the perfect topper for a marlin sundae!
quote.char: I caught a char! Now I'm gonna sit on it!
quote.golden_trout: I caught a golden trout! But the real treasure? Friendship.
quote.stringfish: <big><big>OH MY GOSH!</big></big> I caught a stringfish! Five more and I'll have a guitarfish!
quote.salmon: I caught a salmon! It's all upstream from here!
quote.king_salmon: Yes! I caught a king salmon! Checkmate!
quote.mitten_crab: I caught a mitten crab! One more and I'm ready for winter!
quote.guppy: I caught a guppy! Welcome to the team, newbie!
quote.nibble_fish: I caught a nibble fish! Come to think of it, I could use a bite!
quote.angelfish: I caught an angelfish! That other fish told me to do it!
quote.betta: I caught a betta! I betta not drop it!
quote.neon_tetra: I caught a neon tetra! Wasn't hard to track.
quote.rainbowfish: I caught a rainbowfish! Where's my pot of goldfish?
quote.piranha: I caught a piranha! Sure hope it was the only one!
quote.arowana: I caught an arowana! I'd make a joke, but I don't 'wana.
quote.dorado: I caught a dorado! <big>♪</big>I say Dorado, you say Doraydo.<big>♪</big>
quote.gar: I caught a gar! Yar! It's a gar! Har har!
quote.arapaima: I caught an arapaima! How did it get here? Arapaiknow!
quote.saddled_bichir: I caught a saddled bichir! And me without my tiny riding crop...
quote.sturgeon: I caught a sturgeon! Wonder if it can perform sturgery...
quote.sea_butterfly: I caught a sea butterfly! Try not to confuse it with a sea moth!
quote.sea_horse: I caught a sea horse! But... where's its sea jockey?
quote.clown_fish: I caught a clown fish! How many can fit in a carfish?
quote.surgeonfish: I caught a surgeonfish! Scalpel! Forceps! Fish hook!
quote.butterfly_fish: I caught a butterfly fish! Did it change from a caterpillar fish?
quote.napoleonfish: I caught a Napoleonfish! It's not as big as it thinks!
quote.zebra_turkeyfish: I caught a zebra turkeyfish! Land, air, water - make up your mind!
quote.blowfish: I caught a blowfish! I'm blown away!
quote.puffer_fish: I caught a puffer fish! I thought you would be tougher, fish!
quote.anchovy: I caught an anchovy! Stay away from my pizza!
quote.horse_mackerel: I caught a horse mackerel! Of course, Mack...er...el.
quote.barred_knifejaw: I caught a barred knifejaw! They must have a hard time eating!
quote.sea_bass: I caught a sea bass! No, wait - it's at least a C+!
quote.red_snapper: I caught a red snapper! It looks pretty dapper!
quote.dab: I caught a dab! Not bad!
quote.olive_flounder: I caught an olive flounder! That's not the pits!
quote.squid:
I caught a squid! It's off the hook!
I caught a squid! I had an inkling I might!
I caught a squid! Do they... not actually bloop?
quote.moray_eel: I caught a moray eel! When you're in love, that's a moray!
quote.ribbon_eel: I caught a ribbon eel! Can it tie itself into a bow?
quote.tuna: I caught a tuna! It's a little off-key!
quote.blue_marlin: I caught a blue marlin! Listen to this fish. It's got a point.
quote.giant_trevally: I caught a giant trevally! Yeah, I'm pretty well-trevalled.
quote.mahi_mahi: I caught a mahi-mahi! It's all mahine-mahine.
quote.ocean_sunfish: I caught an ocean sunfish! Good thing I'm wearing ocean sunscreen!
quote.ray: I caught a ray! A few more and I'll have a tan!
quote.saw_shark: I caught a saw shark! You could call it a sea saw!
quote.hammerhead_shark: I caught a hammerhead shark! I hit the nail on the head!
quote.great_white_shark: I caught a great white shark! Watch out for its jaws!
quote.whale_shark: <big>Thar she blows!</big> I caught a whale shark! I'm tellin' ya, it was thiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiis big!
quote.suckerfish: I caught a suckerfish! I thought it was a shark! Oh, wait - now I get it. Sucker...
quote.football_fish: I caught a football fish! Some countries call it a soccer fish!
quote.oarfish: I caught an oarfish! I hope I catch morefish!
quote.barreleye: I caught a barreleye! Like eyeing fish in a barrel!
quote.coelacanth: <big><big>Blast from the past!</big></big> I caught a coelacanth! Think positive! Be a coela-CAN!

location.salmon:
In the mouths of rivers during the first half of September;
Anywhere in rivers during the second half of September
